text:
@WhiteHouse These reporters are driving me crazy with their stupid questions!

1 out 10 people with symptoms that were tested for #coronavirus 9 of them did not have the virus, what do the other 9 people have?

A common cold, allergies, the flu, other virus?

Lets open the country back up!
